name: ZuluBoy
description: '''Mxolisi Mgingqeni Majozi'''  (born May 19, 1976) also known as Zuluboy is a South African actor and musician from [[Ntuzuma]], KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. He has worked with legendary South African hip hop artists, most of whom he drew inspiration from such as [[Linda Mkhize|PRO]].
